example.text: Her Pa ( Howard Duff ) is the kind of guy who , while [*-3] saying grace at the supper table , [*T*-4] pauses at the word `` sin '' and glares at the daughter [0] he has n't seen [*T*-2] for two decades , because he knows in his heart that she enjoyed what [*T*-1] happened in the cold-storage room , and has been indulging the same taste ever since in the fleshpots of Chicago .
